author: sobryan
msg: I've made some changes to the way  the website is generated.  I'm creating a branch of the 1.0.0-beta tag so that I can make the necessary modifications to the pom files without changing the tag.  In future releases, these changes will be part of the tag.

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-2017] Updated test for adding build definitions to a template, and moved the test from the failing to online test suite.

author: bentmann
msg: o Extended IT to check other failure modes, too

author: josh
msg: Fixing bug 46551 - spelling mistakes in xSSFCell.checkBounds().  Also fixed 0/1-based index error for cell range checks in XSSF.
